welcome: Welcome to the DSA Problem Solver

hero.title: Master Data Structures & Algorithms
hero.subtitle: Automate your daily DSA practice with AI-powered solutions and smart automation
hero.description: Solve problems, get AI explanations, and automate submissions. Your personal DSA learning assistant.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to master DSA

automation.title: Daily Problem Automation
automation.description: Set up automated daily problem solving with custom configurations. Choose difficulty, topics, and let the system handle the rest.

filters.title: Smart Problem Filters
filters.description: Filter problems by difficulty, topic, company tags, and more. Find exactly what you need to practice.

languages.title: Multi-Language Support
languages.description: Solve problems in your preferred programming language. Support for Python, Java, C++, JavaScript, and more.

notifications.title: Email Notifications
notifications.description: Get daily problem notifications with AI-generated explanations and solutions. Customize what you receive.

ai.title: AI-Powered Solutions
ai.description: Get detailed explanations and multiple solution approaches using advanced AI models. Learn from brute force to optimized solutions.

automationTools.title: Automation Tools
automationTools.description: Automate problem submissions using Puppeteer. Save time and focus on learning while the system handles submissions.

step1.title: Configure Your Setup
step1.description: Set your preferences: difficulty level, topics, programming language, and notification settings.

step2.title: Get Daily Problems
step2.description: Receive curated DSA problems daily based on your configuration and learning goals.

step3.title: AI-Powered Learning
step3.description: Get detailed explanations, multiple solution approaches, and learn from optimized code.

step4.title: Automated Submission
step4.description: Let the system automatically submit your solutions and track your progress.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your DSA Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers mastering algorithms with our automated platform.

footer.description: Master Data Structures & Algorithms with AI-powered solutions and automated problem solving.
footer.copyright: Â© {year} DSA Solver. All rights reserved.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize your application appearance and preferences

theme.title: Theme Mode
theme.description: Choose how the application theme adapts to your system preferences
theme.label: Appearance
theme.systemDescription: Your theme will automatically match your system's appearance settings.
theme.lightDescription: Application will always use light theme regardless of system settings.
theme.darkDescription: Application will always use dark theme regardless of system settings.

colorPalette.title: Color Palette
colorPalette.description: Select your preferred color scheme for the application
colorPalette.label: Color Scheme

sidebar.title: Sidebar Configuration
sidebar.description: Customize the sidebar appearance and behavior

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application
language.label: Select Language
language.descriptionText: Changing the language will update the interface text throughout the application.

login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your email address to receive a one-time password
login.emailDescription: We'll send a 6-digit code to this email address
login.error: Failed to send OTP. Please try again.

verifyOtp.title: Verify OTP
verifyOtp.otpDescription: Check your email for the 6-digit verification code
